channel.title: Operators & Cycles in Java, Python, Bash
channel.description: Recent content on Operators & Cycles in Java, Python, Bash

item.title: Bash
item.description: IF if [[ condition ]]; then commands fi IF-THEN-ELSE if [[ condition ]]; then commands 1 else commands 2 fi FOR for var in list do commands done WHILE while [ condition ] do commands done CASE case “$variable” in “$condition1” ) command… ;; “$condition2” ) command… ;; esac

item.title: Java
item.description: IF if (condition) { commands } IF-ELSE IF-ELSE if (condition) { commands } else if { commands } else { commands } FOR for (initialization; condition; iteration) { commands } WHILE while (condition) { commands } SWITCH switch (variable) { case constant1: commands break; case constant2: commands break; case constant3: commands break; default: commands }

item.title: Learning operators & cycles in Java, Python, Bash
item.description: The site contains the syntax of some control structures & cycles in Java, Python and Bash

item.title: Python
item.description: IF if (condition): commands IF-ELIF-ELSE if (condition): commands elif (condition): commands else: commands FOR for <variable> in <iterable>: commands WHILE while (condition): commands SWITCH No operator. Use if…elif…
